# 2.2.0 (03 Jan 2023)

## Feature

* Build with a PEP517 in-tree backend
* Add Manette
* Add Adwaita
* Add Gdk4

## Typing

* Improve type hints for
    - Gtk4
    - Gdk4
    - Gtk3
    - Soup
    - Gio
    - GObject
    - Soup3

# 2.1.0 (18 Dec 2022)

## Changes

* Port to pyproject.toml

# 2.0.0 (18 Dec 2022)

## Changes

* Add install option for multi version libs
* Newest version of lib is installed by default
